About Stripe

Stripe is the best way to accept payments online and in mobile apps. We handle billions of dollars every year for forward-thinking businesses around the world.

We can implement the Stripe API using it's java library. We first make plans for subscription then take the details of the customer and send it to the server. The details are used to sign up the customer on their servers so that the payment will be deducted on monthly bases depending on the plan.

For More details see:
https://stripe.com/subscriptions
